entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • navigation drop-downs in C # #58691
  • region should have different background color #58689
  • Quick Actions and Refactorings should allow user to add a new extension method #58688
  • Visual Studio should suggest private extension methods to be made public #58686
  • If a method is inaccessible due to its protection level, then Ctrl + . should make it public #58684
  • [UI] Indent incompatible types in CS0029 error popup in a way they can differ easier #58682
  • Text editor option for predecessor directives missing #58681
  • Change target framework without Navigation bar #58679
  • Exclude folder from namespace #58678
  • File-Scoped Namespace should always have a fix all option available #58673
  • Annotate IParameterSymbol.ContainingSymbol as non-null #58670
    17.1
  • NullReferenceException when calling SyntaxFactory.ParseArgumentList #58668
    Compiler.Next
  • Quick action "Move type to new file" does not fix header or remove unneeded using statements #58660
  • ClassifierHelper's AdjustSpans method occasionally generates an empty span #58658

Closed

  • Add support for a nuget package to say it does not support HotReload #56681
  • Add Option for #region to be on left or indented like labels are in options #58687
  • Hot Reload test scenario: Hot Reload notifications and reloadable types #55561
    17.0
  • Investigate purpose of Logger.LogBlock calls #55685
    17.1
  • Benchmark algorithm options for LongestCommonSubsequence #55712
    17.1
  • Null ref in CommitSolutionUpdate #56617
    17.1
  • Developers see exactly what they need to in the lightbulb menu #58275
    Backlog
  • Expose 'debug-determinism' flag (or something similar) so that tooling can determine if the compiler is confident it would return the same result. #53302
    17.1
  • VB semantic tests dumping core on Linux #29660
    Compiler.Next
  • Span<T> in async methods not supported #27147
  • Null array constant in metadata causes overflow in attribute decoding #58598
    17.1
  • Null string array passed to InterpolatedStringHandlerArgument crashes compiler and IDE analyzers #58025
    17.1
  • [SourceLink] Output window logging #57352
    17.1.P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Better parse when lambda expressions contain default parameter values. #58690
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove contract check to avoid crash #58675
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • Run debug builds for pull requests instead of full pairwise testing #58669
    Area-Infrastructure
  • SpillSequenceSpiller.Spill - ensure sequences under ref assignments are spilled. #58657
    Area-Compilers
  • Move suggestion mode configuration to state reset service #58656
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Do not synthesize a parameterless constructor for struct types; report error if struct has field initializers but no constructors #58581
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58677
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58676
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Call InitializeTelemetrySession on background thread (#58399) #58674
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Correctly handle null array constants from source and metadata #58604
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58671
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Set the default value of Combine With Indicator Margin to false #58661
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Reduce the number of duplicate ProjectId instances found in OOP #58667
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Upgrade Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry to 16.4.22 #58621
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Remove workarounds for https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/29660 #58659
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Simplify new integration tests using a source generator #58524
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58664
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58655
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP] Fix semantic tokens overlap bug #58620
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Simplify fault reporting #58367
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Don't run CI for docs-only changes #58712
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Null annotate ParameterSymbol and derived #58700
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement GetTypesByMetadataName #58366
    Area-Compilers
  • Update source-generators.cookbook.md #58713
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1540706 #58384
    auto-merge
  • Rename Basic to Visual Basic in Visual Studio options page #53134
    Area-IDE
  • Fix code generation to add default constraint when needed #53318
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Unskip TestSupportedDiagnosticsMessageHelpLinkUri #51882
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Don't crash when default namespace isn't a valid name #58704
    Area-IDE
  • Deduplicate references in CommandLineProject.CreateProjectInfo #58701
    Area-IDE
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58703
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add GlassTestsHotReloadService external access #58456
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Add a tagger that draws a line to indicate the indentation level of a raw string literal. #58518
    Area-IDE
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Cleanup Renamer.RenameDocumentAction API #58508
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58698
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Remove a first chance exception for normal cancellation #58646
    Area-IDE
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers, Feature - Param Null Checking
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Null annotate ISymbol.ContainingSymbol #58340
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators
